CustomField.description: To track the impact of LinkedIn on the Lead. New Lead means that the rep created a new Lead as a direct result of LinkedIn activities. Influenced Lead means that the Lead already existed in Salesforce, but the rep has engaged with them through LinkedIn.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: New Lead = a new Lead as a direct result of LinkedIn activities. Influenced Lead = the Lead already existed in Salesforce, but the rep has engaged with them through LinkedIn.
CustomField.label: LinkedIn Navigator
